summary: My personal collection of mods, patches and tweaks which overhaul and enhance many of Skyrims interiors.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/84868/84868-1519769005-170288287.png[/img][/center]
[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80577-0-1484184182.png[/img][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]This is my personal collection of files, mods, merges and tweaks which cumulatively overhaul and enhance the majority of Skyrims most frequented shops, taverns, houses and more. I have cherry picked the best interiors, from the best mods and together they presently enhance 76 cells.

[center][youtube]-cNssnNJ-qY[/youtube][/center][/size]
[/font]
[center][color=#ffff00][size=6]CONTENTS[/size][/color][/center]
[center]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ffff00][size=3]Quickstart
Requirements
LoadOrder
Compatibility & Customisation
Files Overview
Other Recommendations
SSE
Merging
Credits & Permissions
My Other Mods
[/size][/color][/font][/center]
[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]
QUICKSTART[/size][/color][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][u][b]loadorder critical[/b][/u], [b][u]conflicting cells critical[/u][/b], remove conflicting cells in TES5. Works with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79746/?]settes mods[/url], remove WhiterunDragonsreach and/or Whiterundragonsreachjarlsquarters accordingly, plus patch cells. Works with IWillBlechas [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61237/?]useless shop mod[/url], new ELFX patch available. PCB console 31 day wait or newgame essential for discovered clutter misplacement. TES5 Cleaned.
[/font]
[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]
REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][u][b]ELFX is an optional requirement[/b][/u] for the Enhanced Interiors Taverns plugin. [u][b]There is a non ELFX version[/b][/u] in the comment sticky.

[u][b]ELFX is a hard requirement[/b][/u] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41852/?]Aurora Village[/url] plugin.

[b][u]ELFX is a hard requirement[/u][/b] for the ELFX/[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61237/?]Useless Shop Overhaul[/url] patch.

[u][b]ELFX is NOT a hard requirement[/b][/u] for the Enhanced Interiors Radioactive plugin but I urge you to make use of it. I have done a lot of work in this patch and I recommend you use them both as this is how I intended the interiors to look.

[b][u]ELFX is NOT a hard requirement[/u][/b] for the Longhouses plugin but I have done a lot of work in the ELFX plugin and urge you to use it.[/font]
[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]

SUGGESTED LOAD ORDER[/size][/color][/center]

[center][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/80577-0-1484183508.jpg[/img][/center]

[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]COMPATIBILITY & [/size][/color][color=#ffff00][size=4]CUSTOMISATION[/size][/color][/center]

[color=#ffff00]Compatible Mods:[/color]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]This mod is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61237/?]The Useless Shop and Interior Overhaul[/url]. There is also an optional ELFX patch for this mod available in the downloads. This patch is rebuilt completely by myself and is different from the existing file on the nexus in bulb placement, smoke flow and disabling various references.

This mod is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79746/?]Castles and Palaces Enhanced[/url] but you will have to disable the Dragonsreach parts from it, or my mod (Enhanced Radioactive Interiors), to make them compatible. Disable the cells accordingly in TES5EDIT. The affected cells are WhiterunDragonsreach and WhiterunDragonsreachJarlsQuarters. You will have to do the same thing for their respective cells in my ELFX patches.
[/font]
[color=#ff0000]Incompatible mods:[/color]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]This mod is [color=#ff0000]incompatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80393/?]Uniques shops and stores[/url].[/color] However, you can remove conflicting cells in tes5edit from your interior plugins and leave the ones you want, whilst removing the rest. e.g. you really like an interior from unique shops and want to use it in place of one of mine. Remove the cell from my mod, and leave the cell from unique shops.

My taverns plugin is[color=#ff0000] incompatible with Realistic Room Rental, friendlier taverns, bathing in taverns[/color] etc. Ask their respective authors to make a patch for you. My mod is[color=#ff0000] also incompatible with Inncredible and Taverns by Jetmouse[/color], as both mods are already fully incorporated.

[/font]It has also been reported that [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60603/?]Unofficial ELFX SMIM ENB FPS performance patch[/url] is[color=#ff0000] incompatible[/color] as it blocks the upstairs in the Bee and barb.

[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]
FILES OVERVIEW[/size][/color][/center]

[color=#ffff00]The files available are: [/color]

* [color=#00ff00]Enhanced Interiors Radioactive[/color]
* Enhanced Interiors Radioactive ELFX patch
* Enhanced Interiors SPO patch (Skyrim Project Optimisation)
* Enhanced Interiors 3DNPC patch
* Enhanced Interiors ELFX Enhancer patch

* [color=#00ff00]Enhanced Interiors Taverns[/color] (ELFX is an[color=#ff7700] optional [/color]requirement, see comment sticky for Non ELFX version)

* [color=#00ff00]Enhanced Interiors Longhouses[/color]
* Enhanced Interiors Longhouses ELFX patch

* [color=#00ff00]Enhanced Interiors Aurora Village[/color]  (ELFX is a hard requirement)

* [color=#00ff00]Enhanced Interiors ELFX patch[/color] for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61237/?]The Useless Shop and Interior Overhaul[/url] 



[u][color=#00ff00][size=5]Enhanced Interiors Radioactive[/size][/color][/u]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]This plugin is a merged file comprising the majority of RoseRosenbergfr work from her Skyrim Radioactive page. I have combined her plugins and fixed the existing issues. I have optimised, repaired navmesh, x markers, duplicated references, lighting and much more.  [/font]

[color=#ffff00][size=2]Radioactive cells modified[/size][/color]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Helgen - Helgen Keep

Markarth - Arnleif and Sons Trading Company, The Hags Cure

Riften - The Bee and Barb, Black Briar Manor, Black Briar Meadery, Elgrims Elixirs, Riften Fishery, Haelgas Bunkouse, Honorhall Orphanage, Riften Mausoleum Hall Of The Dead, Marise Aravels House, Pawned Prawn, Riften Stables, Romlyn Dreths House, Snow Shod Manor, Temple Of Mara, Valindors House, Riften Warehouse

Riverwood - Faendals House, Hod and Gerdurs House, Sven and Hildes House

Solitude - Angelines Aromatics, Bits and Pieces, Solitude Blacksmith, Solitude Catacombs, Solitude Hall Of The Dead, Erikurs House, Radiant Raiment, Solitude Fletcher, Solitude Stables

Whiterun - Amrens House, Carlotta Valentias House, Dragonsreach - Farengars Laboratory, Dragonsreach - Jarls Quarters, Heimskirs House, House Gray Mane, House of Clan Battle-Born, Olava The Feebles House, Severio Pelagias House, Temple Of Kynareth, Uthgerds House, Ysoldas House, Arcadias Cauldron, Warmaidens 

Windhelm - Blacksmith, Calixto's House of Curiosities, Candlehearth Hall, New Gnisis Cornerclub, Sadris Used Wares, The White Phial[/font]

[color=#ffff00][size=2]Radioactive cells un-modified[/size][/color]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]I have purposefully excluded cells from the original Radioactive series like Whiteruns Shops as there are other mods that do a better job in my opinion. Same thing for the Blue Palace. I also excluded the main hall from Dragonsreach due to FPS issues, plus imo the vanilla hall looks absolutely fine. I have however included Farengars lab and the Jarls Quarters as they look fab. There are links for these other files below so you can improve these interiors accordingly. To confirm, the Radioactive portion of my mod [b][u]does not modify[/u][/b] Arcadias, Warmaidens, Bannered Mare, Belethors, the Blue Palace or the Drunken Huntsman.
[/font]
[size=5]
[u][color=#00ff00]Enhanced Interiors Taverns[/color][/u][/size]

[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]As well as modifying cells I also added my own twist to several taverns and added to the lore. You can gain more insight by looking inside the basket in Moorside Inn. As for what you discover...

I also added some things to Frostfruit Inn, as Rorikstead really is a curious little town.  As for The Frozen Hearth, I made it that way because I am a gardener, i hate the snow and needed something really enticing to make the trip worth my while. And yes, those empty-ish Skooma bottles have fertilised that vine. 

In many of the other Inns I have placed objects that hint at the games major story lines etc, let me know your thoughts in the comments.[/font]

[color=#ffff00]

Cells Modified:[/color]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Dawnstar - Windpeak Inn
Dragonbridge - Four Shields Tavern
Ivarstead - Vilemyr Inn
Kynesgrove - Braidwood Inn
Markarth - Silver-Blood Inn
Morthal - Moorside Inn
Reach - Old Hroldan Inn
Reach - Old Hroldan House
Reach - Old Hroldan Smith
Riverwood - Sleeping Giant Inn
Rorikstead - Frostfruit Inn
Solitude - The Winking Skeever
Winterhold - The Frozen Hearth[/font]

[color=#ffff00][size=2]Cells Un-modified[/size][/color]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Falkreath - Dead Man's Drink & Hroldan - Nightgate Inn.
I use Shezries Unique Taverns mod for these two taverns and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/82156/?]the author[/url] has informed me they will shortly be releasing updated versions of this mod.[/font]

[u][color=#00ff00][size=5]Enhanced Interiors Longhouses[/size][/color][/u]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Dawnstar - The White Hall
Falkreath - Jarls Longhouse
Morthal - High Moon Hall
Solitude - Castle Dour
Winterhold - The White Hall[/font]


[u][color=#00ff00][size=5]Enhanced Interiors Aurora Village[/size][/color][/u][size=5]
[/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Aurora Borealis Inn
General stores (Anjas House)
Prismatic Potions (Skarlas House)
[/font]

[u][color=#00ff00][size=5]Enhanced Interiors ELFX patch for The useless shop and interior overhaul[/size][/color][/u]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Arcadias Cauldron
Belethors 
The Bannered Mare
The Bosmeric Drunken Huntsman
Warmaidens

[/font]As of EIRv2, there are updated IwilUSAIO and iwilUSAIO elfx plugins included in the main EIR 2 download which play nicely with EIRv2.


[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]OTHER RECOMMENDATIONS[/size][/color][/center]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]I purposefully have not modified certain cells as there are other mods out there that already do a great job.[/font]

[color=#ffff00]Markarth - Understone Keep[/color]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]I use this mod instead [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21374/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21374/?[/url][/font]

[color=#ffff00]Castles and Palaces[/color]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]I use this mod instead [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79746/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79746/?[/url]
Enhanced Interiors radioactive is compatible with Castles and Palaces Enhanced but you will have to remove the Dragonsreach parts from it, or my mod (Enhanced Radioactive Interiors), to make them compatible. Remove the cells accordingly in TES5EDIT. The affected cells are WhiterunDragonsreach (BL 5 SBL 5) and WhiterunDragonsreachJarlsQuarters. You will have to do the same thing for their respective cells in their ELFX patches. To confirm, you can use settes mods with my mods but you have to remove the dragonsreach cells from either mine or their mods.[/font]

[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]SSE[/size][/color][/center][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]
I have uploaded an SSE conversion, courtesy of Waylander47. This version is a merged plugin of all the above files, and requires SPO, 3DNPC, ELFX and USAIO. This is a beta version and is not recommended for a long term save. Check the sticky for details.[/font]

[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]MERGING[/size][/color][/center]
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode]As yet untested. I advise you merge patches with masters. From there you can merge those merges.
(i.e. Merge Enhanced Interiors Radioactive with Enhanced Interiors ELFX patch etc. Then make another merge of Aurora Village with Aurora Village ELFX patch. Then merge those merges together)[/font]

[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]CREDITS

[/size][/color][i][color=#00ffff][size=3]Massive thanks has to go to SetteLisette who painstakingly went through my work and ever so kindly made me custom patches. For Settes support I am eternally grateful, and want to take this opportunity to say thankyou. Please go and endorse.  Sette makes some amazing mods and you need to check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79746/?]Castles and Palaces Enhanced[/url], one of the best palace mods on the Nexus. If you don't have it, get it.

Deeply grateful to Mebantiza who provided a ton of fixes and updates under the hood, that improve gameplay, boost FPS and fix a ton of other issues now resolved in version 1.2.6. Mebantiza has some great mods like Another Sorting Mod, Opulent Outfits and Bijin AIO. Checkout his mods here > [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/2782784/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/2782784/?[/url]
[/size][/color][/i][/center]
[center]Credits to Mebantiza who updated and fixed the mod for version 1.2.6 and provided a ton of fixes.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/2782784/?]http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/2782784/? [/url]
Credits to SetteLisette who provided patches and assistance in getting this whole thing off the ground.

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/users/23888979]https://rd.nexusmods.com/users/23888979[/url][/center]

[center][color=#ffff00][size=4]PERMISSION[/size][/color][/center]
[color=#ffff00][size=4]You are not permitted to re-upload, share, or charge for this mod. It contains assets from other authors so you need to obtain my permission first before sharing any updates, fixes etc you made to this. [/size][/color]

author: Kojak747

files.name: Enhanced Interiors Radioactive 1.2.7
files.changelogHtml: Re-uploaded due to Nexus eating the file.

files.name: Enhanced Interiors USAIO ELFX patch v2
files.fileName: Enhanced Interiors USAIO ELFX patch v2-80577-2.7z
files.changelogHtml:
Rollup of all previous fixes, plus >

Fixes
Removed Elisifs sleep package in blue palace.
Removed Odar works 8x12 package from blue palace.
Corrected master out of order issue that existed in v1.2.x

Added
Skyrim Radioactive Arcadia's Cauldron now included in main Enhanced Interior Radioactive.esp
Skyrim Radioactive Warmaidens now included in main Enhanced Interiors Radioactive.esp

Updated
Edited IWil_UselessShopOverhaul.esp so it plays nicely with EIRv2
Edited Enhanced Interiors USAIO ELFX Patch.esp so it plays nicely with EIRv2

New plugin
Enhanced Interiors Taverns NON ELFX version now available
